pullRequest.title: Persistence Layer for Rest API server
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implements Server Repository and Persistence Management. It includes

Repository Management
ServerRepositories with access to backend
Backend creation with credentials management based on VersionControlSystem

Closes #537

nodes.bodyText: Why do we throw IOException and an explicit FileNotFoundException if we only catch the IOException in initRepoRegistry()?

commit.message:
Changes due to review - (Task #537)

- removed redundant exception in throw statement of method

---
Task #537: Persistency for server project repositories

Minor fixes due to review - (Task #537)

- Had to add a remote repo to also test ramping up a SVN backend in the
repo registry tests.

---
Task #537: Persistency for server project repositories

Fixed dependency to CreateSvnServerOperation - (Task #537)

- Tycho cannot resolve fragments as Eclispe IDE does, therefore classes
which are reused in another test fragment need to be placed in a package
which does not exist in the host and this package needs to be implicitly
imported to the using fragment.

---
Task #537: Persistency for server project repositories

Fix location of test resource - (Task #537)

Moving test reosurce from plugin path to runtime workspace

---
Task #537: Persistency for server project repositories

nodes.bodyText: Why is it import package instead of require bundle?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,10 @@ Bundle-Version: 4.11.0.qualifier
 Fragment-Host: de.dlr.sc.virsat.server;bundle-version="0.0.1"
 Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.8
 Bundle-Vendor: DLR (German Aerospace Center)
-Require-Bundle: org.junit
+Require-Bundle: org.junit,
+ org.eclipse.egit.core,
+ org.hamcrest.library,
+ org.eclipse.team.svn.core
 Export-Package: de.dlr.sc.virsat.server.test
 Automatic-Module-Name: de.dlr.sc.virsat.server.test
+Import-Package: de.dlr.sc.virsat.project.test

nodes.bodyText: Let's use File.createTempFile() for this
Something wrong with line endings?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,2 +1,5 @@
 # Default properties for Virtual Satellite Server configuration
-config.area = /resources
\ No newline at end of file
+repository.configurations.dir = ~/virtual_satellite/configurations/repositories

nodes.bodyText: Let's use a temporary file for this
Let's maybe move this constant directly into the test where we use it? I don't think it's useful as a class field.
Let's also assert size=1
Let's assert repositories empty
Let's use a proper setter
I suggest we just use two git projects and get rid of all this SVN setup because it's not relevant for this test

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	 * @throws URISyntaxException
URI exception probably not thrown anymore
URI exception probably not thrown anymore

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * This class is a helper class to enabled testing svn repositories
          
          
            
             * This class is a helper class to enable testing svn repositories

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	 * @param pathRepoLoacl the local path in which to checkout the project.
          
          
            
            	 * @param pathRepoLocal the local path in which to checkout the project.

@@ -35,11 +34,14 @@
 	/**
 	 * Creates a local checkout of a project from the version control system
 	 * @param projectDescription the project metadata
+	 * @param pathRepoLoacl the local path in which to checkout the project.
